about_the_game:
"MythicZon is a charming 3D game that combines survival, zombie combat, and resource management. In this game, you'll encounter a terrifying world overrun by zombies, and your goal is to survive while battling hordes of the undead.

Key Features:

Survival: Stay alert and avoid zombie wandering. Use survival skills to endure day and night.
Weapons and Upgrades: Collect different weapons, including rifles, pistols, and grenades. Upgrade your arsenal to enhance its effectiveness against zombies.
Unlocking Doors and Collecting Currency: Explore the surrounding areas, unlock closed doors, and search for money and resources. Some areas may require you to unlock doors to access new areas.
Base Development: Build a sturdy base to survive. Upgrade buildings and enhance security to protect yourself from zombie attacks.

MythicZon offers an entertaining and immersive experience. Are you ready to face the horror and challenges? 🧟‍♂️🔫"

name: MythicZon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (v.1803 or higher)
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1+ Recommended
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060 super or AMD RX 6600-XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1+ Recommended
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: "MythicZon: a captivating 3D game merging survival, zombie combat & resource management. Navigate a world overrun by zombies, survive their onslaughts, upgrade weapons & fortify your base. Ready to face the horror? 🧟‍♂️🔫"
